summary.span: 使编译器可以将对象字段动态附加到托管对象。

span.span: Enables compilers to dynamically attach object fields to managed objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使语言编译器可以在运行时将任意属性附加到托管对象。The class enables language compilers to attach arbitrary properties to managed objects at run time. 对象是一种字典, 它将由键表示的托管对象绑定到其附加属性, 该对象由值表示。A object is a dictionary that binds a managed object, which is represented by a key, to its attached property, which is represented by a value. 对象的键是属性附加到的`TKey`类的各个实例, 其值是分配给相应对象的属性值。The object's keys are the individual instances of the `TKey` class to which the property is attached, and its values are the property values that are assigned to the corresponding objects. 密钥必须唯一;换言之, 该类支持每个托管对象的一个附加值。Keys must be unique; in other words, the class supports one attached value per managed object. 如果将两个键传递给方法返回`true`, 则这两个键相等。Two keys are equal if passing them to the method returns `true`. > [!NOTE] > 不能通过重写来控制相等比较, 以显式设置键的哈希代码。You cannot control equality comparisons by overriding to explicitly set the hash code for a key. 类不使用方法来计算哈希代码, 因此不调用重写。 The class does not use the method to compute hash codes, and therefore does not invoke overrides. 虽然类包含键/值对的集合, 但最好将其视为表而不是字典对象。Although the class holds a collection of key/value pairs, it is best thought of as a table rather than a dictionary object. 类不同于字典的方式有多种:The class differs from a dictionary in several ways: - 它不会保留密钥。It does not persist keys. 也就是说, 键不会保持活动状态, 因为它是集合的成员。That is, a key is not kept alive only because it is a member of the collection. - 它不包含字典通常具有的所有方法 ( `GetEnumerator`如`Contains`或)。It does not include all the methods (such as `GetEnumerator` or `Contains`) that a dictionary typically has. - 它不实现接口。It does not implement the interface. 类不同于在它管理存储在集合中的键的对象生存期时的其他集合对象。The class differs from other collection objects in its management of the object lifetime of keys stored in the collection. 通常情况下, 当对象存储在集合中时, 它的生存期将一直持续到删除 (不存在对对象的其他引用) 或直到集合对象本身被销毁。Ordinarily, when an object is stored in a collection, its lifetime lasts until it is removed (and there are no additional references to the object) or until the collection object itself is destroyed. 但是, 在类中, 将键/值对添加到表中并不能确保该键将保持不变, 即使它可以直接从表中存储的值进行访问 (例如, 如果表包含一个键, a, 值为 V1和第二键 B, 其值 P2 包含对的引用。However, in the class, adding a key/value pair to the table does not ensure that the key will persist, even if it can be reached directly from a value stored in the table (for example, if the table contains one key, A, with a value V1, and a second key, B, with a value P2 that contains a reference to A). 相反, 只要表外不存在对键的其他引用, 就会自动删除键/值项。Instead, automatically removes the key/value entry as soon as no other references to a key exist outside the table. 说明如示例所示。The example provides an illustration. ## Examples 下面的示例说明了当表中的引用被销毁后, 存储在表中的键不会保留。The following example illustrates that a key stored in the table does not persist after references to it outside the table are destroyed. 此示例定义了两个`ManagedClass`类:, 表示表中的键, 而`ClassData`表示键的值。The example defines two classes: `ManagedClass`, which represents the key in the table, and `ClassData`, which represents the key's value. 该示例实例化每个类型的三个对象。The example instantiates three objects of each type. 它还将实例化表示第二个`ManagedClass`实例的对象, 然后销毁`ManagedClass`第二个实例。It also instantiates a object that represents the second `ManagedClass`, and then destroys the second `ManagedClass` instance. `ManagedClass` 尝试从属性中检索第二个对象表示不保留对该对象的任何引用。The attempt to retrieve the second `ManagedClass` object from the property indicates that no references to the object remain. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.conditionalweaktable.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.conditionalweaktable.class/vb/example1.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 类的实例是线程安全的。

span.span: Instances of the class are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 它们不需要调用方执行任何其他锁定。

span.span: They do not require callers to do any additional locking.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数实例化一个空表, 即表不包含键/值对。 The constructor instantiates an empty table; that is, the table contains no key/value pairs. 可以通过调用、 或方法添加键/值对。You can add key/value pairs by calling the , , or method. 对象中的每个键都必须是唯一的。Every key in a object must be unique. 如果键引用相同的对象 (即, 如果将它们作为参数传递给该方法返回`true`), 则它们不是唯一的。Keys are not unique if they refer to the same object (that is, if passing them as arguments to the method returns `true`).

Public Sub Add (key As TKey, value As TValue)
public: void Add(TKey key, TValue value);

param.name: key

span.span: The key to add.

param.span: 表示该属性附加到的对象。

span.span: represents the object to which the property is attached.
The key's property value.
Adds a key to the table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象中的每个键都必须是唯一的。Every key in a object must be unique. 如果键引用相同的对象 (即, 如果将它们作为参数传递给该方法返回`true`), 则它们不是唯一的。Keys are not unique if they refer to the same object (that is, if passing them as arguments to the method returns `true`). 如果在加法运算过程中对该密钥进行垃圾回收, 则会删除现有的键/值对, 并添加新的键/值对, 而不会引发异常。If the key is garbage-collected during the addition operation, the existing key/value pair is removed and the new key/value pair is added without an exception being thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了`MainClass`一个类和`MainInfo`一个类, 该类提供有关实例`MainClass`的信息。The following example defines a `MainClass` class and a `MainInfo` class, which provides information about the `MainClass` instance. 然后, 该示例调用方法, `MainClass`将对象及其附加`MainInfo`对象添加到表中。The example then calls the method to add a `MainClass` object and its attached `MainInfo` object to a table. 该示例还演示了对和 方法的调用, 以向表中添加键/值对, 并演示了方法以检索现有键的值。The example also illustrates calls to the and methods to add key/value pairs to the table, and to the method to retrieve the value of an existing key. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable.GetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.conditionalweaktable.getvalue/cs/getvalue1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable.GetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.conditionalweaktable.getvalue/vb/getvalue1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 确保垃圾回收器回收 对象时释放资源并执行其他清理操作。

span.span: Ensures that resources are freed and other cleanup operations are performed when the garbage collector reclaims the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当当前对象准备好完成时, 垃圾回收器将调用。The garbage collector calls when the current object is ready to be finalized.

span.span: The key to search for.

param.span: 表示该属性附加到的对象。

span.span: represents the object to which the property is attached.

summary.span: 以原子方式在表中搜索指定键，并返回对应的值。

span.span: Atomically searches for a specified key in the table and returns the corresponding value.

summary.span: 如果表中不存在该键，此方法将调用表示表值的类的无参数构造函数，以创建绑定到指定键的值。

span.span: If the key does not exist in the table, the method invokes the parameterless constructor of the class that represents the table's value to create a value that is bound to the specified key.

returns.span: 如果表中已存在 ，则为对应于 的值；否则为 范型类型参数定义的类的无参数构造函数创建的新值。

span.span: The value that corresponds to , if already exists in the table; otherwise, a new value created by the parameterless constructor of the class defined by the generic type parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`key`表中不存在, 则该方法将添加它以及通过调用`TValue`泛型类型参数定义的类的无参数构造函数进行实例化的对象。If `key` does not exist in the table, the method adds it, along with the object that is instantiated by calling the parameterless constructor of the class defined by the `TValue` generic type parameter. 如果类没有无参数构造函数 , 则将引发。 `TValue`If the `TValue` class has no parameterless constructor, a is thrown. 如果表值的类定义无参数的构造函数, 则建议使用此方法检索现有值或向表中添加新值。This is the recommended method of retrieving an existing value or adding a new value to the table if the class of the table's value defines a parameterless constructor. 如果它未定义无参数构造函数, 则可以改为调用方法, 该方法依赖于回调提供的方法来实例化表示表值的对象If it does not define a parameterless constructor, you can instead call the method, which relies on a callback-provided method to instantiate the object representing the table's value 若要检索现有键的值而不添加键/值对 (如果在表中找不到该键), 请调用方法。To retrieve the value of an existing key without adding the key/value pair if the key is not found in the table, call the method. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了`MainClass`一个类和`MainInfo`一个类, 该类提供有关实例`MainClass`的信息。The following example defines a `MainClass` class and a `MainInfo` class, which provides information about the `MainClass` instance. 该示例调用方法, `MainClass`将对象及其附加`MainInfo`对象添加到表中。The example calls the method to add a `MainClass` object and its attached `MainInfo` object to a table. 该示例还演示了对和 方法的调用, 以向表中添加键/值对, 并演示了方法以检索现有键的值。The example also illustrates calls to the and methods to add key/value pairs to the table, and to the method to retrieve the value of an existing key. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable.GetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.conditionalweaktable.getvalue/cs/getvalue1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable.GetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.conditionalweaktable.getvalue/vb/getvalue1.vb#1)]

span.span: In the .NET for Windows Store apps or the Portable Class Library, catch the base class exception, , instead.

exception.span: 表示表中值的类未定义无参数构造函数。

span.span: The class that represents the table's value does not define a parameterless constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance !TValue GetValue(!TKey key, class System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable`2/CreateValueCallback<!TKey, !TValue> createValueCallback) cil managed
public: TValue GetValue(TKey key, System::Runtime::CompilerServices::ConditionalWeakTable<TKey, TValue>::CreateValueCallback ^ createValueCallback);

param.name: key

span.span: The key to search for.

param.span: 表示该属性附加到的对象。

span.span: represents the object to which the property is attached.

param.name: createValueCallback
param.span: 可以为给定 创建值的方法的委托。

span.span: A delegate to a method that can create a value for the given .

param.span: 它只有一个 TKey 类型的参数，并返回一个 TValue 类型的值。

span.span: It has a single parameter of type TKey, and returns a value of type TValue.

summary.span: 以原子方式在表中搜索指定键，并返回对应的值。

span.span: Atomically searches for a specified key in the table and returns the corresponding value.

summary.span: 如果表中不存在该键，此方法将调用一个回调方法来创建绑定到指定键的值。

span.span: If the key does not exist in the table, the method invokes a callback method to create a value that is bound to the specified key.

returns.span: 如果表中已存在 ，则为附加到 的值；否则为 委托返回的新值。

span.span: The value attached to , if already exists in the table; otherwise, the new value returned by the delegate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`key`表中不存在, 则调用由`createValueCallback`参数定义的方法, 并向其传递密钥。If `key` does not exist in the table, invokes the method that is defined by the `createValueCallback` parameter and passes it the key. 新值绑定到表中的键, 并返回结果。A new value is bound to the key in the table and returned as a result. 仅当表示表值的类未定义无参数的构造函数时, 才使用此方法。Use this method only when the class that represents the table's value does not define a parameterless constructor. 如果它定义了无参数的构造函数, 请改用方法。If it does define a parameterless constructor, use the method instead. 若要检索现有键的值而不添加键/值对 (如果在表中找不到该键), 请调用方法。To retrieve the value of an existing key without adding the key/value pair if the key is not found in the table, call the method. 如果多个线程尝试创建相同的键, `createValueCallback`则可以用相同的键多次调用。If multiple threads try to create the same key, `createValueCallback` may be invoked multiple times with the same key. 只有其中一个调用将成功, 并且其返回值将添加到表中。Only one of these calls will succeed, and its returned value will be added to the table. 哪个线程成功创建值是不确定的。Which thread succeeds in creating the value is indeterminate. 此规则允许表在内部表`createValueCallback`锁之外调用以防止死锁。This rule permits the table to invoke `createValueCallback` outside the internal table lock to prevent deadlocks. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了`MainClass`一个类和`MainInfo`一个类, 该类提供有关实例`MainClass`的信息。The following example defines a `MainClass` class and a `MainInfo` class, which provides information about the `MainClass` instance. 它还定义了一个静态`Shared` (在 Visual Basic `CreateAttachedValue` ) 方法, 该方法可分配给委托并传递给方法。It also defines a static (`Shared` in Visual Basic) `CreateAttachedValue` method that can be assigned to the delegate and passed to the method. 该示例调用方法, `MainClass`将对象及其附加`MainInfo`对象添加到表中。The example calls the method to add a `MainClass` object and its attached `MainInfo` object to a table. 该示例还演示了对和 方法的调用, 以向表中添加键/值对, 并演示了方法以检索现有键的值。The example also illustrates calls to the and methods to add key/value pairs to the table, and to the method to retrieve the value of an existing key. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable.GetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.conditionalweaktable.getvalue/cs/getvalue1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ConditionalWeakTable.GetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.runtime.compilerservices.conditionalweaktable.getvalue/vb/getvalue1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在此操作过程中对该密钥进行了垃圾回收, 则`false`该方法`value`可能返回并将设置为默认值 (如同该键不存在)。If the key is garbage-collected during this operation, the method may return `false` and set `value` to the default value (as if the key were not present). ## Examples 下面的示例定义了`MainClass`一个类和`MainInfo`一个类, 该类提供有关实例`MainClass`的信息。The following example defines a `MainClass` class and a `MainInfo` class, which provides information about the `MainClass` instance. 该示例调用、和 方法, 将键/值对添加到表中。The example calls the , , and methods to add key/value pairs to a table. 在每种情况下, 该示例调用方法以确认已将键/值对添加到表中。In each case, the example calls the method to confirm that the key/value pair has been added to the table.
